featured.text: Furthermore, watching horror movies can disturb sleep patterns, as the residual fear and anxiety they evoke may keep people awake all night, thus leading to fatigue and irritability the following day.

definition.zh_def: 剩餘的，殘留的部分或量。
definition.en_def: Remaining after the greater part has been removed or has gone.
definition.example: The residual effects of the medication lasted for several hours.
